TESTOSTERONE ENANTATE

ANDROGENS

  • Indications and doses
  • Side effects
  • Medicinal forms

Indications and doses

Hypogonadism,

By slow intramuscular injection

  • For adults
    Initially 250 mg every 2–3 weeks; maintenance 250 mg every 3–6 weeks.

Breast cancer,

By slow intramuscular injection

  • For adults
    250 mg every 2–3 weeks.

Known side effects

General side effects

notKnown: Suppression of spermatogenesis,

Prepared medicinal forms of TESTOSTERONE ENANTATE

There can be variation in the licensing of different medicines containing the same drug.

Solution for injection
